pros: My co-workers were supportive and amazing to work with, including staff from ancillary departments, creating a true team environment to provide the best care for our patients.
cons: Management needed to be more visible and interact with staff and be more aware of what was going on in the departments at the ground level, especially when there are big changes going on.

review_title: Very great, working with Dr.Pizarro is so amazing and the staff is wonderful and very caring.
pros: We care for are patients like they are family and treat them like family as well. Dr. Pizarro always puts her patients before anything.
cons: Sometimes we get only a 10 min. lunch break.

job_title: Emergency Room Registrations in Marinette, WI

cons: Like any other organization, money is very important.  They sometimes choose that over the benefit of patients and employees.
